TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Makotaay, title = Makotaay, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Makotaay} }

S.FORM: = Makotaay = Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Fungpinsyang ka alang Makotaay. 146 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 415 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 97% niqan 402 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 3% niqan 13 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Amis 93%, Kebalan 1%, ni rahuq na o 3%. Makotaay Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Yurisyang ka alang Makotaay. 159 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 524 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 84% niqan 438 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 16% niqan 86 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Amis 79%, Paiwan 1%, ni rahuq na o 3%. Pnyahan pnatas

= Makotaay = Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Fongpinsyang ka alang Makotaay. 146 sapah ka kneego na sapah, 415 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnposo seejiq o mangal 97% niqan 402 hiyi sp, rahoq na oxay tnposo seejiq o mangal 3% niqan 13 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Amis 93%, Kebalan 1%, ni rahoq na o 3%. Makotaay Gaga mniq Hwareyseyn Yorisyang ka alang Makotaay. 159 sapah ka kneego na sapah, 524 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnposo seejiq o mangal 84% niqan 438 hiyi sp, rahoq na oxay tnposo seejiq o mangal 16% niqan 86 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Amis 79%, Paiwan 1%, ni rahoq na o 3%. Pnyahan pnatas
